caption: This photograph captures a serene lake setting. The foreground features a smooth, reflective surface of the water, mirroring the sky and clouds above. Midground is occupied by a dense cluster of trees on a small land formation, their green foliage contrasting with the blue skies. On the left side of the image, a small white boat is captured mid-motion, creating a spray of water as it speeds across the lake. In the background, a bridge spans the width of the lake, nestled between tree-covered hills. The overall mood of the image is peaceful, with elements of human activity indicated by the boat and bridge, suggesting a blend of natural and human-influenced landscapes.
title: View of an outfall containing styrene emptying into Raccoon Creek which empties into the Ohio River. It comes from the Koppers Chemical Kobuta plant in Potter Township, Beaver County which is west of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
